description: Returns drift information for resources in a stack instance.

parameters.name: StackSetName
parameters.description: The name or unique ID of the stack set that you want to list drifted resources for.

parameters.name: StackInstanceResourceDriftStatuses
parameters.description: The resource drift status of the stack instance. DELETED: The resource differs from its expected template configuration in that the resource has been deleted. MODIFIED: One or more resource properties differ from their expected template values. IN_SYNC: The resource's actual configuration matches its expected template configuration. NOT_CHECKED: CloudFormation doesn't currently return this value. (string) ---

parameters.name: StackInstanceAccount
parameters.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services account that you want to list resource drifts for.

parameters.name: StackInstanceRegion
parameters.description: The name of the Region where you want to list resource drifts.

parameters.name: OperationId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the drift operation.

parameters.name: CallAs
parameters.description: [Service-managed permissions] Specifies whether you are acting as an account administrator in the organization's management account or as a delegated administrator in a member account. By default, SELF is specified. Use SELF for stack sets with self-managed permissions. If you are signed in to the management account, specify SELF. If you are signed in to a delegated administrator account, specify DELEGATED_ADMIN. Your Amazon Web Services account must be registered as a delegated administrator in the management account. For more information, see Register a delegated administrator in the CloudFormation User Guide.

nested_items.name: Summaries
nested_items.description: A list of StackInstanceResourceDriftsSummary structures that contain information about the specified stack instances.

nested_items.name: StackId
nested_items.description: The ID of the stack instance.

nested_items.name: LogicalResourceId
nested_items.description: The logical name of the resource specified in the template.

nested_items.name: PhysicalResourceId
nested_items.description: The name or unique identifier that corresponds to a physical instance ID of a resource supported by CloudFormation.

nested_items.name: PhysicalResourceIdContext
nested_items.description: Context information that enables CloudFormation to uniquely identify a resource. CloudFormation uses context key-value pairs in cases where a resource's logical and physical IDs aren't enough to uniquely identify that resource. Each context key-value pair specifies a unique resource that contains the targeted resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The resource context key.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The resource context value.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: Type of resource. For more information, see Amazon Web Services resource and property types reference in the CloudFormation User Guide.

nested_items.name: PropertyDifferences
nested_items.description: Status of the actual configuration of the resource compared to its expected configuration. These will be present only for resources whose StackInstanceResourceDriftStatus is MODIFIED.

nested_items.name: PropertyPath
nested_items.description: The fully-qualified path to the resource property.

nested_items.name: ExpectedValue
nested_items.description: The expected property value of the resource property, as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters.

nested_items.name: ActualValue
nested_items.description: The actual property value of the resource property.

nested_items.name: DifferenceType
nested_items.description: The type of property difference.
ADD: A value has been added to a resource property that's an array or list data type.
REMOVE: The property has been removed from the current resource configuration.

nested_items.type: as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters
nested_items.description: NOT_EQUAL: The current property value differs from its expected value (as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters).

nested_items.name: StackResourceDriftStatus
nested_items.description: The drift status of the resource in a stack instance.
DELETED: The resource differs from its expected template configuration in that the resource has been deleted.
MODIFIED: One or more resource properties differ from their expected template values.
IN_SYNC: The resource's actual configuration matches its expected template configuration.
NOT_CHECKED: CloudFormation doesn't currently return this value.

nested_items.name: Timestamp
nested_items.description: Time at which the stack instance drift detection operation was initiated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the previous paginated request didn't return all of the remaining results, the response object's NextToken parameter value is set to a token. To retrieve the next set of results, call this action again and assign that token to the request object's NextToken parameter. If there are no remaining results, the previous response object's NextToken parameter is set to null.
